files.patch:
@@ -1779,3 +1779,3 @@
-    ::_snprintf(ebuf, ebuflen - 1,
-                "Can't load %s-bit .dll on a %s-bit platform",
-                lib_arch_str, running_arch_str);
+    os::snprintf(ebuf, ebuflen - 1,
+                 "Can't load %s-bit .dll on a %s-bit platform",
+                 lib_arch_str, running_arch_str);
@@ -1784,3 +1784,3 @@
-    ::_snprintf(ebuf, ebuflen - 1,
-                "Can't load this .dll (machine code=0x%x) on a %s-bit platform",
-                lib_arch, running_arch_str);
+    os::snprintf(ebuf, ebuflen - 1,
+                 "Can't load this .dll (machine code=0x%x) on a %s-bit platform",
+                 lib_arch, running_arch_str);

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2005, 2019, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2005, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -29,5 +29,0 @@
-#ifdef _MSC_VER
-# ifndef snprintf
-#       define snprintf _snprintf
-# endif
-#endif

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2005, 2023, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2005, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -1529,2 +1529,2 @@
-        ::_snprintf(text, sizeof(text), "%d of %d", (int)messageNumber,
-                                                    (int) messageCount);
+        ::snprintf(text, sizeof(text), "%d of %d", (int)messageNumber,
+                                                   (int) messageCount);

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2012, 2023, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2012, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -36,6 +36,0 @@
-// Disable CRT security warning against _snprintf
-#pragma warning (disable : 4996)
-
-#define snprintf  _snprintf
-#define vsnprintf _vsnprintf
-

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 1998, 2008, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 1998, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -37,5 +37,0 @@
-/* Needed on Windows because names seem to be hidden in stdio.h. */
-
-#define snprintf        _snprintf
-#define vsnprintf       _vsnprintf
-

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2003, 2023, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2003, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -439,7 +439,7 @@
-        _snprintf(fullCounterPath,
-                  fullCounterPathLen,
-                  PROCESS_OBJECT_INSTANCE_COUNTER_FMT,
-                  objectName,
-                  imageName,
-                  instance,
-                  counterName);
+        snprintf(fullCounterPath,
+                 fullCounterPathLen,
+                 PROCESS_OBJECT_INSTANCE_COUNTER_FMT,
+                 objectName,
+                 imageName,
+                 instance,
+                 counterName);
@@ -475,6 +475,6 @@
-            _snprintf(fullCounterPath,
-                      fullCounterPathLen,
-                      OBJECT_WITH_INSTANCES_COUNTER_FMT,
-                      objectName,
-                      instance,
-                      counterName);
+            snprintf(fullCounterPath,
+                     fullCounterPathLen,
+                     OBJECT_WITH_INSTANCES_COUNTER_FMT,
+                     objectName,
+                     instance,
+                     counterName);
@@ -482,5 +482,5 @@
-            _snprintf(fullCounterPath,
-                      fullCounterPathLen,
-                      OBJECT_COUNTER_FMT,
-                      objectName,
-                      counterName);
+            snprintf(fullCounterPath,
+                     fullCounterPathLen,
+                     OBJECT_COUNTER_FMT,
+                     objectName,
+                     counterName);
@@ -722,4 +722,4 @@
-            _snprintf(fullIDProcessCounterPath,
-                      MAX_PATH,
-                      pdhIDProcessCounterFmt,
-                      index);
+            snprintf(fullIDProcessCounterPath,
+                     MAX_PATH,
+                     pdhIDProcessCounterFmt,
+                     index);
@@ -1062,7 +1062,7 @@
-    _snprintf(pdhIDProcessCounterFmt,
-              pdhIDProcessCounterFmtLen,
-              PROCESS_OBJECT_INSTANCE_COUNTER_FMT,
-              pdhLocalizedProcessObject,
-              pdhProcessImageName,
-              "%d",
-              pdhLocalizedIDProcessCounter);
+    snprintf(pdhIDProcessCounterFmt,
+             pdhIDProcessCounterFmtLen,
+             PROCESS_OBJECT_INSTANCE_COUNTER_FMT,
+             pdhLocalizedProcessObject,
+             pdhProcessImageName,
+             "%d",
+             pdhLocalizedIDProcessCounter);
